question.ask: Questions 1~2   Your school is planning an opening ceremony for the coming sports meeting. Ask the event organizer two questions about the ceremony.

std.value: Where will the opening ceremony be held? When will the opening ceremony be held?
std.ai: Where will the opening ceremony be held? When will the opening ceremony be held?

std.value: What is the theme of the opening ceremony? How long will the opening ceremony last?
std.ai: What is the theme of the opening ceremony? How long will the opening ceremony last?

std.value: Who holds the opening ceremony? How many people will attend the opening ceremony?
std.ai: Who holds the opening ceremony? How many people will attend the opening ceremony?

std.value: When will the opening ceremony begin? When will the opening ceremony end?
std.ai: When will the opening ceremony begin? When will the opening ceremony end?

std.value: Who will attend the opening ceremony? What kind of performance will be put on?
std.ai: Who will attend the opening ceremony? What kind of performance will be put on?

std.value: What kind of shows will you put on? How many shows will be put on?
std.ai: What kind of shows will you put on? How many shows will be put on?

std.value: When shall I get there? When shall I arrive?
std.ai: When shall I get there? When shall I arrive?

std.value: Will there be performances at the opening ceremony? How many shows will you put on?
std.ai: Will there be performances at the opening ceremony? How many shows will you put on?

question.keywords: Where ceremony held|When ceremony held|What theme ceremony|How long ceremony last|Who holds ceremony|When ceremony begin|When ceremony end|How many people attend ceremony|Who attend ceremony|What kind performance put on|What kind shows you put on|How many shows put on|When shall I get there|When shall I arrive|will there performances

std.value: When should I start preparations for applying for the university? How many universities can I apply for?
std.ai: When should I start preparations for applying for the university? How many universities can I apply for?

std.value: How can I get the latest information about the university? Which university in the UK do you recommend?
std.ai: How can I get the latest information about the university? Which university in the UK do you recommend?

std.value: What is the average tuition fee there? Is the accommodation provided by the school?
std.ai: What is the average tuition fee there? Is the accommodation provided by the school?

std.value: What materials do I need to prepare when applying for the university? Where can I get the latest information about the university?
std.ai: What materials do I need to prepare when applying for the university? Where can I get the latest information about the university?

std.value: How many universities should I apply for? Which university in the UK do you think is the best one?
std.ai: How many universities should I apply for? Which university in the UK do you think is the best one?

std.value: Do I need to get high grades in high school for applying for the university? How to choose the right school for myself?
std.ai: Do I need to get high grades in high school for applying for the university? How to choose the right school for myself?

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your classmate, Jenny, has been admitted to a famous university in the UK. You want to further your study in UK too. Ask Jenny for advice.
question.keywords: when should apply|how many apply|how get information|which recommend|what fee|is accommodation provided|what prepare|where get information|which best|need high grades|how choose
